data.eml:eml: Gymnesigobius medits (Teleostei: Gobiidae), a new gobiid genus and species from the western Mediterranean slope bottoms

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kovačić, Marcelo, Ordines, Francesc, Ramirez-Amaro, Sergio, Schliewen, Ulrich K. (2019): Gymnesigobius medits (Teleostei: Gobiidae), a new gobiid genus and species from the western Mediterranean slope bottoms. Zootaxa 4651 (3): 513-530, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4651.3.6
